name: MicroATE
description:
MicroATE is a platformer where you play as a microwave that's trying to navigate through the world it woke up in. Guide him to his fate.

Features:

- 4 Achievable Endings.

- 5 Stages.

- Score System.

- Wall climbing mechanic

Controls:

(A) = Move left.

(D) = Move right.

(Spacebar) = Jump/ wall climbing.

(Shift) = Dash

Music Credits:

Alejandro Magaña (A. M.)

https://mixkit.co/free-stock-music/ambient/

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/nuisance/
